summary: This document contains a Deutsche Bank Private Wealth Management Option Agreement and Approval Form related to Jeffrey Epstein and Jeanne Brennan. It outlines account details, investment strategies, and risks associated with options trading. The document highlights the financial status and investment objectives of the account owners, as well as the potential risks involved in uncovered option writing.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is listed as an authorized person to place orders for the account held at Deutsche Bank.

persons.name: Jeanne Brennan
persons.context: Jeanne Brennan is also listed as an authorized person to place orders for the account held at Deutsche Bank.

keyFacts: The account is registered under Southern Trust Company Inc.
The document outlines various investment strategies including uncovered option writing, which carries significant risks.
Jeffrey Epstein and Jeanne Brennan are authorized to place orders for the account.
The document includes a detailed description of the risks associated with options trading.
There are indications of substantial financial activity and investment objectives related to options trading.
